game.beginning: In a world where magic has been outlawed, the land is plagued by dark creatures and tyrannical rulers.
game.ending: The hero defeats the dark sorcerer and shatters the curse, restoring balance to the world and ushering in a new era of peace.
game.synopsis: In the realm of Tenaria, where ancient magic once thrived, a young orphan named Eira discovers she possesses latent magical abilities. Recruited by a secret group of rebels, Eira embarks on a perilous quest to vanquish the dark sorcerer Xaren and shatter the curse that has oppressed the land for centuries.
game.title: Shadows of Tenaria
